title: Three points of an iron triangle

content.question: The three points of an iron triangle include

choices.label: an independent agency, a state, and a member of Congress
an administrative agency, an interest group, and a congressional committee
a cabinet department, an interest group, and the House majority leader
a regulatory commission, a corporation, and the White House Office
the Executive Office of the President, an interest group, and a Senate committee

content.answer: an administrative agency, an interest group, and a congressional committee

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
